resources.string: The simplest terminal emulator for android!
Congrats! Root Access is already available for this app!
Unfortunately, Root Access is either unavailable on your device or denied to this app. Please check with you\'re root management application to know more!
Get sTerminal %s, the simplest terminal emulator for android, from GitHub: https://github.com/sunilpaulmathew/sTerminal/tree/main/release
sTerminal is an open-source application which is ready to accept contributions from the development community. Click here to check out the source code!

If you like to appreciate the efforts of the developer to provide this application entirely free, non-intrusive and without ads, please consider supporting the development in some way. Click here to know more. Thank you!
Help me to translate this app! Click here to get the original language strings in english.
